mapper.select: SELECT t.id as "id", t.project_name as "projectName", t.cost_name as "costName", t.cost_hours as "costHours", t.unit_cost as "unitCost", t.total as "total", to_char(t.work_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd') || '(星期' || (SELECT to_char(to_date(to_char(t.work_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'd') - 1 FROM DUAL) || ')' as "workDate", t.work_add as "workAdd", t.comments as "comments", t.check_flag as "checkResult" FROM (SELECT temp.*, ROWNUM RN FROM (select c.id, f.unit_name || '-' || p.project_name project_name, t.cost_name, c.cost_hours, c.unit_cost, c.cost_hours * c.unit_cost total, c.work_date, c.work_add, c.comments, decode(c.check_flag, null, '否', '是') check_flag from project_cost c, project p, cost_type t, log_id l, fgl_unit f where c.project_no = p.project_no and c.cost_type = t.cost_type and c.create_user = l.log_id and p.customer_no = f.unit_code and c.create_user = #{logId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by c.work_date desc) temp WHERE ROWNUM <= #{num,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) t WHERE RN > (#{num,jdbcType=VARCHAR}-10)

SELECT t.id as "id", t.project_name as "projectName", t.cost_name as "costName", t.cost_hours as "costHours", t.unit_cost as "unitCost", t.total as "total", to_char(t.work_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd') || '(星期' || (SELECT to_char(to_date(to_char(t.work_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'd') - 1 FROM DUAL) || ')' as "workDate", t.work_add as "workAdd", t.comments as "comments", t.check_flag as "checkResult" FROM (SELECT temp.*, ROWNUM RN FROM (select c.id, f.unit_name || '-' || p.project_name project_name, t.cost_name, c.cost_hours, c.unit_cost, c.cost_hours * c.unit_cost total, c.work_date, c.work_add, c.comments, decode(c.check_flag, null, '否', '是') check_flag from project_cost c, project p, cost_type t, log_id l, fgl_unit f where c.project_no = p.project_no and c.cost_type = t.cost_type and c.create_user = l.log_id and p.customer_no = f.unit_code and c.create_user = #{logId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and to_char(c.work_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd') = #{workDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by c.work_date desc) temp WHERE 1=1) t

select to_char(c.work_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') as "workDate" from project_cost c, project p, cost_type t, log_id l, fgl_unit f where c.project_no = p.project_no(+) and c.cost_type = t.cost_type(+) and c.create_user = l.log_id(+) and p.customer_no = f.unit_code(+) and c.create_user = #{logId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and to_char(c.work_date, 'yyyy') = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy') order by c.work_date

select to_char(f.work_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') as "workDate" from work_dates f where 1 = 1 and to_char(f.work_date,'yyyyMMdd') <= to_char(sysdate,'yyyyMMdd') and to_char(f.work_date, 'yyyy') = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy') and f.rest_flag is null and f.work_date >= (select min(t.work_date) from project_cost t where t.create_user = #{logId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and to_char(f.work_date, 'yyyy') = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy')) and not exists (select 'X' from project_cost t where to_char(t.work_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd') = to_char(f.work_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and t.create_user = #{logId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) and to_char(f.work_date, 'yyyy') = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy') order by f.work_date
mapper.delete: delete from project_cost f where f.id = #{id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.insert: insert into project_cost (id, project_no, cost_type, cost_hours, unit_cost, create_user, create_date, work_date, check_flag, comments, work_add) values (project_cost_id.nextval, #{projectNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{costType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{costHours,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{unitCost,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{workDate,jdbcType=DATE}, '', #{comments,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workAdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select to_char(c.work_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') as "workDate" from project_cost c, project p, cost_type t, log_id l, fgl_unit f where c.project_no = p.project_no and c.cost_type = t.cost_type and c.create_user = l.log_id and p.customer_no = f.unit_code and c.create_user = #{logId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) and to_char(c.work_date, 'yyyy') = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy') order by c.work_date desc
